column1: in memory of howard peake| first: last: born: november 8
column4: sc memorial donations may be made to: harmony baptist church. this memorial provided by:pope funeral home. winnsboro
column9: will be held at 11:00 am saturday
column11: 2015 at harmony baptist church cemetery conducted by rev. dr. dan griffin. born in richland county
column12: mr. peake was the son of the late barney and elrie branham peake. he was a member of harmony baptist church. he was a 1957 graduate of blythewood high school and entered army service in 1958 and was honorably discharged in 1964 from the us army reserves. he was a retiree of the dupont company and kennecott ridgeway mining company. survivors include his wife of 55 years
column14: kenneth m. peake; and two brothers
column15: frank peake and milton peake. in lieu of flowers memorials may be made in howards memory to harmony baptist church
column17: elgin sc 29045. pope funeral home is assisting the peake family.
